info: Historic Edwardian boathouse on Ullswater Lake. Grade II listed UNESCO World Heritage Site with 2,150 sq ft event space and lakeside terrace.
LBBW Tower Stuttgart - 22-story banking headquarters with Class A office space, helipad access, and DGNB Gold certified sustainability features.
Lake Geneva luxury retail space on Quai Gustave-Ador. 650 sq m premium shopping unit with panoramic lake views and 24/7 security.
University of Graz Historical Building - Baroque-style 18th-century academic complex with vaulted ceilings and UNESCO City of Design status.
Austin Luxury Realty HQ - Modern 3,500 sq ft brokerage office in Frost Bank Tower featuring smart building systems and rooftop terrace.
Grafental Industrial Complex - 8,500 sq m manufacturing facility with 10-ton crane capacity, rail access, and Industry 4.0 automation.
Villa Courbe by SAOTA - Architectural masterpiece on Lake Geneva with cantilevered design, infinity pool, and commercial event license.
